item.title: github: GitHub MCP Server: New Projects tools, OAuth scope filtering, and new features
item.description:
GitHub released the MCP Server, adding improved management for GitHub Projects with more efficient use of the context window, automatic filtering of tools based on a token’s OAuth scopes/permissions, and additional new features and Projects-focused tools.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: k8s: Headlamp in 2025: Project Highlights
item.description:
Headlamp’s 2025 recap highlights major growth: the project joined Kubernetes SIG UI, absorbed many community contributions via the Linux Foundation mentorship, and shipped several UX and platform features — multi-cluster views, Projects for grouping resources, a taskbar/activities model, improved search and map, OIDC/auth improvements, Helm/App Catalog enhancements, plugin ecosystem growth (including an AI Assistant), and performance, accessibility, and security upgrades.

  • Source: Kubernetes Official Blog

item.title: github: Improved onboarding flow for GitHub Projects
item.description:
GitHub updated the Projects onboarding flow to help users start faster by adding options to connect and import items from a repository and to set a default repository for new issues.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: A REST API for GitHub Projects, sub-issues improvements, and more
item.description:
GitHub announced a REST API for GitHub Projects so developers can read and manage project data programmatically, plus enhancements to sub-issues to make breaking down work easier and other related improvements.

  • Source: GitHub
